document.full_text: saudi arabia, the birthplace of al qaeda leader osama bin laden, hopes that with his death, an "evil has ended," the gulf arab state's deputy interior minister said tuesday.
document.title: saudi hopes with bin laden death an "evil has ended"
lines_and_colors: saudi arabia, the birthplace of al qaeda leader osama bin laden, hopes that with his death, an "evil has ended," the gulf arab state's deputy interior minister said tuesday.
